# Windows Communication Foundation

> Documentation for Windows Communication Foundation.

*Topics available: 1868*

## Subtopics

- [Windows Communication Foundation Extended Index](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/llms-extended.txt): 107 additional topics
- [Administration and Diagnostics](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/llms.txt): 9 topics, 1042 in tree; Administration and Diagnostics documentation and reference.
- [Extending WCF](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/extending/llms.txt): 64 topics; Extending WCF documentation and reference.
- [WCF Feature Details](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/llms.txt): 422 topics; WCF Feature Details documentation and reference.
- [Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) samples](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/llms.txt): 233 topics; Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) samples documentation and reference.
